subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: As France, England, Ireland, Scotland, Wales and Italy do battle for local bragging rights, there will be no escaping the fact that in just a few short months, a bigger prize will be up for grabs in New Zealand.
snippet: As France, England, Ireland, Scotland, Wales and Italy do battle for local bragging rights, there will be no escaping the fact that in just a few short months, a bigger prize will be up for grabs in New Zealand.
